title: Bazooka Bill  for Spectrum 48/128
creator_credit: Arcade Machine Ltd Software, Melbourne House and Fitzroy House
material_description: Cassette tape computer game.  Cassette, cover and plastic cassette case.
brief_description: Bazooka Bill [computer game]. Bazooka Bill is a single player side scrolling shoot ‘em up action plaformer. Bill fights his way through side scrolling maps of different islands to rescue General MacArthur. Bill begins with only his fists and can collect additional weaponry throughout his journey
